author: assaf
msg: rake install now works with JRuby, documentation also covers installation for JRuby

author: jorton
msg: * server/mpm_common.c (reclaim_one_pid): Retrieve the exit status from
apr_proc_wait(); call ap_process_child_status() for children which
terminate, to ensure that abnormal exits (e.g. SIGSEGV) are logged.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-708] change the phase of the copying of LICENSE NOTICES DISCLAIMER to process-resources, which is beyond the phase that the eclipse:eclipse plugin does, so that running eclipse:eclipse no longer copies these files.  Because this is past the time where resources are copied to the target, do that copying also.  Finally, change the phase for the time-stamp creation task to later, so that other tasks don't have to do it.  It must come before use, but the only use is in the packaging (jar) phase, which is quite late.

author: etnu
msg: Streamlined the feature loading mechanism so that the constructor for GadgetFeatureRegistry can load all features at once (and correctly resolve dependencies). Also fixed some feature-loading related bugs with the experimental libs= override.
